generated_doNotEdit.title: Random Sitting Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to randomly sit for a duration.

fields.title: Cooldown Time
fields.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

fields.title: Min Sit Time
fields.description: The minimum amount of time in seconds before the mob can stand back up

fields.title: Start Chance
fields.description: This is the chance that the mob will start this goal, from 0 to 1

fields.title: Stop Chance
fields.description: This is the chance that the mob will stop this goal, from 0 to 1

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
